title: Flight Simulator 2020 - POI's - France - Chateau de Queribus
description:
In this video we will fly over the Chateau de Queribus. The ChÃ¢teau de QuÃ©ribus (in Occitan CastÃ¨l de QueribÃºs) is a ruined castle in the commune of Cucugnan in the Aude dÃ©partement of France. It has been listed as a monument historique by the French Ministry of Culture since 1907.

Queribus is one of the "Five Sons of Carcassonne", along with Aguilar, Peyrepertuse, Termes and Puilaurens: five castles strategically placed to defend the French border against the Spanish, until the border was moved in 1659.
